source.sqlReaderQuery:
with
	-- This sub query gets the limits of the data that will be processed
	FIL as (
		select
			ETL_EXCTN_ID
		from
			PGMPDM.[ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN]
		where
			IS_CURR_IND = 'Y'
	),
	
	-- This subquery gets the JOB ID. Returns -1 is the value is unknown
	JOB as (
		select
			coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
		from
			PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
		where
			ETL_JOB_NM = '#DSJobName#'		
	),
	
	-- This subquery gets the SRC_SYS_ID. Returns -1 is the value is unknown
	SYS as (
		select
			coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
		from
			PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
		where
			SRC_SYS_CD = 'TMF'			
	)
	
	


select
	G.GEO_DIM_UID,
	G.IOT_RGN_CD,
	G.IOT_RGN_NM,
	G.IMT_RGN_CD,
	G.IMT_SRGN_NM,
	G.SRGN_CD,
	G.SRGNCTRY_CD,
	G.SRGNCTRY_NM,
	G.IOTSORT_NUM,
	G.GEO_CD,
	G.GEO_TYP_CD,
	G.GMR_RGN_CD,
	G.GMR_RGN_NM,
	G.IOT_SHORT_NM,
	G.IMT_SHORT_NM,
	JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
	FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
	SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
from
	PGMPDM.GEO_DIM_TMF G
	left join
	JOB
	on 1 = 1
	left join
	FIL
	on 1 = 1
	left join
	SYS
	on 1 = 1
